original_title: Growing Up Smarter: Learning to Tell Time/Learning the Calendar
overview: Children participate in learning process with Tele-Story's "Growing Up Smarter" video series. The fully dramatised original stories are educational and fun. Parents will love to watch with their children.  By comparing the twelve floats in parade to the months of year, children will learn about days, months and major holidays. The parade is an exciting, colorful way to learn about the calendar and how it works.
title: Growing Up Smarter: Learning to Tell Time/Learning the Calendar
